cases.description: Developer commuication channel, for instant messaging, designed to improve a teams fusion with its Continuos Delivery pipeline.
Although slack makes secrets like data passwords easily accessible, it is a terrible idea to use it for sensitive information. Even worse, than a yellow postit note with the db password on your desk.
Should be used for storing machine secrets like tokens and certifikates, but never private keys

name: Feedback from Software Life Cycle Development tools

cases.description: Many teams like to have messages from the continuos delivery pipleine streamed in as part of the team conversation. Also alerts and monitoring events could make their way into the teams slack channel.
Emails can be used as a way to provide feedback for developers in a team from the SLCD tools, like successful build, failed build.
